text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
It's gotta be big, like BOOM,<n>KABLAM! Also... I wanna do<n>
something that feels fast!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...Um, we're talking about our plan for<n>the special concert,
right? Gotta admit,<n>I'm not getting a concert feel from<n>
what you just said.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
By "boom" and "kablam," I presume<n>she's looking for
something with<n>impact. As for "fast," well...

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
We could prepare a float decorated<n>with lights for a few
participants to pull<n>and run with.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's a good idea. I so love your<n>think-first-act-later
attitude, Ikuno!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, they seem to be having a lot of<n>fun over there. Well,
we'll do our best<n>to come up with a plan too!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I-I don't know if I have as free an<n>imagination as the older
students, but<n>I'll try!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
We'll do our best to make this<n>important commemorative
concert a<n>success!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I like that enthusiasm! Let's<n>start by talking about
what color<n>shutter shades we want to wear!
